content:
I apologize if my previous responses were not helpful. I understand that every individual is different, and what works for one person may not work for another. Unfortunately, as an AI language model, I am not capable of providing or recommending magic spells to solve real-world problems.

The best solution would be to practice healthy assertiveness in a compromising manner that does not lead to conflict, which involves setting boundaries without being confrontational or aggressive. However, if you feel uncomfortable or unsafe, the best course of action is to seek help from authorities or leave the situation if possible.

Remember, what you are comfortable with, shouldn't make you uncomfortable later. Your comfort in your personal space is a priority, and you always have the right to be respected.
